entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight then snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
